channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Plummeting Murder Rate Shows ‘Law And Order Works’
item.description: A new report shows the nation's murder rate in 2025 is on pace to be at its lowest level since the data started being tracked in 1900.

item.title: ‘Faithless’ — Springsteen’s Latest Hysterical Politics
item.description: Scritti Politti’s ‘Faithless’ — political songwriting done right.

item.title: Protesters Who Disrupted Minnesota Church Service Were Practicing Their Own Godless Religion
item.description: Promoting political protest as an act of worship leads only to chaos and tragedy.

item.title: Trump’s Greenland Gambit Alienates the European Right He Once Inspired
item.description: The U.S. president is losing the goodwill of the very nationalists and conservatives who until recently saw him as an ally.

item.title: Defense bill bars Pentagon from paying for adult entertainment
item.description: A defense appropriations bill that cleared a House-Senate conference this week will ban Pentagon military and civilian officials from using government...

item.title: Democrats Keep Promising To Throw Their Enemies In Prison. Believe Them
item.description: Whether you're a normal, conservative American who happens to like Trump, or Trump himself, Democrats will work tirelessly to throw their enemies in p...

item.title: As Razor-Thin Midterm Margins Loom, Trump Administration Is Alienating The March For Life Coalition
item.description: Republicans' 2026 success is tied to energizing and mobilizing the pro-life base that propelled Trump back to the White House in 2024.

item.title: Canada’s Misguided China Overtures
item.description: We understand why Prime Minister Mark Carney’s pride has been wounded, but we urge him to think harder about the long-term interest of his country.

item.title: Former Iowa School Superintendent Who Turned Out To Be Criminal Illegal Alien Pleads Guilty
item.description: Ian Roberts agreed to plead guilty Thursday to possessing a weapon as an illegal alien and lying about his immigration status.

item.title: 'The Secret Agent' earns 4 Oscar nominations, boosting Brazilian cinema
item.description: Brazilians celebrated the nomination of "The Secret Agent" film to four Oscar categories on Thursday, which many said confirmed the rise of Brazilian ...

item.title: The Leo Strauss Letter That Previewed a Modern-Day Divide
item.description: As 65-year-old letters between conservative heavyweights reveal, the right’s internecine clashes on foreign policy are nothing new.

item.title: Busting Up a Nexus of Narco-Terrorism
item.description: U.S. pressure on the Iran-Venezuela-Cuba crime network will help protect the Western Hemisphere for years to come.

item.title: Congress puts health insurance CEOs in the hotseat over denied claims, rising premiums
item.description: The personal stories about denied claims offered a few poignant moments amid hours of debate about the root causes of rising healthcare costs and the ...

item.title: House narrowly rejects war powers resolution to block more Trump action in Venezuela
item.description: The House narrowly defeated a war powers resolution Thursday that aimed to block further military action by President Trump in Venezuela without appro...

item.title: House passes final fiscal '26 spending bills, leaving Senate to act before Jan. 30 deadline
item.description: The House passed the final four of the 12 annual spending bills on Thursday, leaving only the Senate left to act to prevent another government shutdow...
